specs.name: Task-Level Build Loop Integration Test
specs.context: Spec requires integration tests for task-level orchestration in build mode. Should extend existing e2e-loop.test.ts pattern (src/__tests__/e2e-loop.test.ts) with mock agent that captures prompts to temp files. Tests verify task isolation (agent gets one task, not full spec) and retry context injection. Existing infrastructure: task-prompts.ts (generateTaskPrompt, generateRetryPrompt), implementation.ts (task state management), quality-gates.ts (runQualityGates), start.ts (runTaskLevelLoop at line 511).

tasks.description: Create mock agent script that captures received prompt to temp file and outputs configurable markers
acceptanceCriteria: Mock script writes prompt to temp file for assertions
Mock script outputs <TASK_DONE> or <TASK_BLOCKED> based on env var
Mock script is executable and works with bun

tasks.description: Create mock quality gate script with configurable exit codes via env var
acceptanceCriteria: Script returns exit code based on MOCK_GATE_EXIT_CODE env var
Script outputs mock failure messages when exit code is non-zero

tasks.description: Write test: 3 tasks spawn 3 separate sessions with isolated prompts
acceptanceCriteria: Given spec with 3 tasks, when build loop runs, then 3 separate agent sessions are spawned
Each captured prompt file contains only its corresponding task description

tasks.description: Write test: captured prompt contains ONLY current task, not other tasks
acceptanceCriteria: Given task 2 of 3, when agent is spawned, then prompt contains ONLY task 2 description
Prompt does not contain task 1 or task 3 descriptions

tasks.description: Write test: quality gate failure triggers retry with failure output in prompt
acceptanceCriteria: Given quality gates fail with 'typecheck: error TS123', when retry spawns, then prompt includes 'typecheck: error TS123'

tasks.description: Write test: implementation.json task status updates to completed after success
acceptanceCriteria: Given all 3 tasks complete successfully, when build loop finishes, then all 3 tasks show status 'completed' in implementation.json

tasks.description: Write test: blocked task gets marked with reason from TASK_BLOCKED marker
acceptanceCriteria: Given agent outputs '<TASK_BLOCKED reason="missing API key">', when build loop processes, then task status is 'blocked' with blockedReason 'missing API key'
Test proves task isolation (agent never sees full spec, only current task)
Test proves retry includes failure context
CI passes with mocked agent tests (no real AI calls)
Tests follow pattern from existing e2e-loop.test.ts
